title: DJ Sessions: Bands And Songs In Rebirth
teaser: KCRW's Anne Litt shares a playlist with new music from TV on the Radio, which is out with its first album since the death of a band member.
contentencoded:
In this week’s installment of the Here & Now DJ Sessions, KCRW‘s Anne Litt shares new music from TV on the Radio — from the band’s first album since a band member died in 2011 of lung cancer.

We also hear about a collaboration based on old Bob Dylan lyrics, which involves T Bone Burnett and Marcus Mumford of Mumford & Sons, among other musicians.
